content: P.P.S. And if you're a fitness instructor, Fitclass.com is the perfect platform for you too! With our built-in tips system, you can earn money while you burn calories. You can use our platform as a social media platform to get thousands or even millions of followers. And the best part, Fitclass encourages our trainers to not have a paywall for their classes or to charge people for their classes. This will limit exposure. By doing classes for Free, it's like Twitch or Youtube live. You, in fact, become a health streamer. You can look at FitClass as a health Streaming Platform. Twitch is for gamers, Youtube live is for content creators, and fitclass.com is for health and wellness professionals to stream their classes live to a global audience and receive real-time tips. So, sign up now and start streaming your classes and reach a global audience.
